segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 2
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 2

segments.pli: 8. Sanimittavagga
segments.en: 8. With a Foundation

segments.pli: “Sanimittā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no animittā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a foundation, not without a foundation.

segments.pli: Tasseva nimittassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that foundation, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sanidānā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no anidānā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a source, not without a source.

segments.pli: Tasseva nidānassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that source, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sahetukā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no ahetukā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a cause, not without a cause.

segments.pli: Tasseva hetussa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that cause, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sasaṅkhārā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no asaṅkhārā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with conditions, not without conditions.

segments.pli: Tesaṃyeva saṅkhārānaṃ pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up those conditions, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sappaccayā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no appaccayā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a reason, not without a reason.

segments.pli: Tasseva paccayassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that reason, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sarūpā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no arūpā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with form, not without form.

segments.pli: Tasseva rūpassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that form, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Savedanā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no avedanā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with feeling, not without feeling.

segments.pli: Tassāyeva vedanāya pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that feeling, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Sasaññā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no asaññā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with perception, not without perception.

segments.pli: Tassāyeva saññāya pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that perception, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Saviññāṇā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no aviññāṇā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with consciousness, not without consciousness.

segments.pli: Tasseva viññāṇassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that consciousness, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: “Saṅkhatārammaṇā, bhikkhave, uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no asaṅkhatārammaṇā.
segments.en: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a conditioned basis, not without a conditioned basis.

segments.pli: Tasseva saṅkhatassa pahānā evaṃ te pāpakā akusalā dhammā na hontī”ti.
segments.en: By giving up that conditioned basis, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”

segments.pli: Sanimittavaggo tatiyo.
